chat_history.message: Hello, My product iPhone 12 mini has the above problem: When can I get it? Many thanks for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We wanted to let you know Philipp hasn’t received their order.

The tracking link doesn't work, so we’re unable to check the package's location.

Can you let us know if the order was shipped, and under which tracking number?
In case the order was not shipped yet, please ship it and provide a valid tracking number, or refund the order under 1 business day.

Karl Albert Haas
Hundsgäßchen 5
63916 Amorbach
Deutschland
0176 45786718
philippkhaas@posteo.de

Let us know if you have any questions or concerns — we’ll keep an eye out for your reply.

Thanks for your help,

Claudia, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have shipped out the device to the customer.

Here is the tracking number: 1ZBF1560D901197765

Please note that as the courier has just picked up the parcel, it might take a while before it is accurately displayed on their website.

In the meantime please do not refund.

If you initiate a refund while the product is being shipped, we will lodge a case with SSC.

Regards,
HB

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link, the parcel has been delivered to the customer. If the customer requires no further assistance, kindly close the case. Thank you.

Regards,
JY
